string.name: name
string.value: Spot On : Go See Mr. Spot
Mr. Spot is in Kerning City, and he has something that could help Mom and Dad. I'd better go see my parents first before I visit him.
I visited Mr. Spot and got the Mouse for Mom and Dad. I can get a #bNexon Prepaid#k from Mr. Spot if I ask them for #bAllowance#k. I'll cross my fingers...
I got my #bNexon Prepaid#k! I should keep it, because it will turn into Maple Points soon! SWEET!
Hi! I'm Mr. Spot and your Mom and Dad told me you might be coming here. I have the mouse for them, but first I'd like to tell you about something else I have. Would you like to hear it?

Well, I have something here called a #bNexon Prepaid#k. It comes in 2 kinds: #b100 points#k and #b250 points#k. These are available wherever you see the store that I work in, #rTarget#k. You will need your #bAllowance#k from Mom and Dad to get one, though. I can give you the Mouse you want for free if you come back later to get a #bNexon Prepaid#k. Keep the card, and in two weeks it will turn into actual Maple Points you can use. Here's the mouse you need. Hurry back!
I can see that you aren't going to change your mind anytime soon. That's sad. When you're ready to finish your chore, come back!
Ah, back already I see, ready to get your #bNexon Prepaid#k?
Excellent, well, here you go! Remember to keep it, after the Event ends, it will become #rMaple Points#k you can use in the Cash Shop!
Looks like you have some dirt, but not your #bAllowance#k. When you get your #bAllowance#k from Mom and Dad, be sure to return!
